patthana2.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—alobhaṁ paṭicca adoso amoho, adosaṁ paṭicca alobho amoho, amohaṁ paṭicca alobho adoso, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho, mohaṁ paṭicca lobho, dosaṁ paṭicca moho, mohaṁ paṭicca doso;
patthana2.1:3.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:4.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—alobhaṁ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ (cakkaṁ).
patthana2.1:4.1_1: Lobhaṁ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:5.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:5.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana2.1:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū;
patthana2.1:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:7.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:7.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca hetū sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.1:8.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṁ).
patthana2.1:8.1_1: Lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho, dosañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho …pe…
patthana2.1:9.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:9.1_1: dve khandhe ca hetuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:9.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuñca hetuñca paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.1:10.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.1:11.1_1: adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi, paripuṇṇaṁ) ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe…

patthana2.1:16.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—hetuṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:17.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—nahetū khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:18.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— hetuñca nahetuñca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.1:19.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe alobhaṁ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṁ).

patthana2.1:22.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.1:27.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—arūpe nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca …pe…

patthana2.1:40.1_2: Pañcāyatanāni anulomepi paccanīyepi yathā labbhanti tathā kātabbā.

patthana2.1:43.1_0: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:44.1_0: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—hetuṁ ārabbha hetū uppajjanti.

patthana2.1:47.1_14: nahetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:48.1_0: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā.

patthana2.1:53.1_0: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.1:54.1_0: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.1:54.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:55.1_0: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.1:55.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—hetuṁ garuṁ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:55.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:56.1_0: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.1:56.1_2: Nahetū khandhā.) **Sahajātādhipati**—nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:57.1_0: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana2.1:59.1_0: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.1:332.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

patthana2.1:343.1_0: Nahetuyā nava …pe… (sabbattha nava) noavigate nava. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana2.1:345.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha …pe…
patthana2.1:345.1_1: namagge cha, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.1:347.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.1:349.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— hetusampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.1:359.1_1: Lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṁ);
patthana2.1:360.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.1:363.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe…
patthana2.1:365.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—alobhaṁ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṁ);
patthana2.1:365.1_2: (paripuṇṇaṁ nava), napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava.
patthana2.1:366.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—hetuṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.

patthana2.1:368.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā …
patthana2.1:369.1_0: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.1:371.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.1:373.1_0: Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava …pe… avigate nava. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana2.1:376.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.1:378.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:379.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—hetuṁ ārabbha hetū uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:380.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—hetuṁ ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.1:382.1_11: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.1:513.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— nahetu ahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:514.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.1:515.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— nahetu ahetukā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:516.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.1:517.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo—nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:518.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo— nahetu ahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:519.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.1:519.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nahetū sahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:519.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—nahetū sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:520.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.1:520.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nahetū ahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:520.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—nahetū ahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:521.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.1:522.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:523.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ …pe….
patthana2.1:524.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.1:525.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.1:525.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nahetu ahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.1:525.1_5: kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana2.1:526.1_0: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.1:526.1_4: domanassaṁ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana2.1:526.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.1:527.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.1:527.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.1:527.1_3: nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana2.1:528.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā nahetuahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.1:528.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:528.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:528.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.1:529.1_0: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta (evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ)

patthana2.1:538.1_1: Sabbattha satta), nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
patthana2.1:540.1_0: Ārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.1:542.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta.
